StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateCandidateInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@NWARowId uniqueiden..er ,@BootsIssuedDate date.me = null ,@TravelVoucherCompletedDate date.me = null ,@RFOSubmitedDate date.me = null ,@RFASubmitedDate date.me = null ,@Notes varchar(200) = null)
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @NwaId int SELECT @NwaId = n.NWA_ID FROM [dbo].[NWA] n WHERE n.[rowguid] = @NWARowId
IF EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM [USMC].[CandidatePoolCardInfo] cpf WHERE cpf.NWA_ID = @NwaId) BEGIN UPDATE [USMC].[CandidatePoolCardInfo] SET [BootsIssuedDate] = @BootsIssuedDate ,[TravelVoucherCompletedDate] = @TravelVoucherCompletedDate ,[RFOSubmitedDate] = @RFOSubmitedDate ,[RFAOSubmitedDate] = @RFASubmitedDate ,[LastUpdateUserId] = newid() ,[LastUpdateDate] = GetDate() ,[Notes] = @Notes WHERE [NWA_ID] = @NwaId
END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [USMC].[CandidatePoolCardInfo] ([NWA_ID] ,[BootsIssuedDate] ,[TravelVoucherCompletedDate] ,[RFOSubmitedDate] ,[RFAOSubmitedDate] ,[LastUpdateUserId] ,[LastUpdateDate] ,[Notes]) VALUES (@NwaId ,@BootsIssuedDate ,@TravelVoucherCompletedDate ,@RFOSubmitedDate ,@RFASubmitedDate ,newid() ,GetDate() ,@Notes) END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
